TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BypassElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: Represents the address information for resources that are not retrieved using a proxy server. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class corresponds to the `address` attribute of the [\<add\> Element for bypasslist (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/add-element-for-bypasslist-network-settings.md) configuration element.
This class is used to specify when a proxy server should not be used to handle requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes. A resource in the bypass list is retrieved directly from the server where it resides.
This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string address) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that identifies the address of a resource.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified type information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement.Address%2A> property is set to `address`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the addresses of resources that bypass the proxy server.
Docs.value: A string that identifies a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property contains the address of a resource that is obtained without using a proxy server. Requests for the resource are sent directly to the server where the resource resides.
